definition.name: Azure Static Web Apps Deploy
definition.description: Deploys an application to Azure Static Web Apps
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: app_location
inputs.description: Directory location of the application source code

inputs.name: api_build_command
inputs.description: Custom command for Oryx to run when building Azure Functions source code

inputs.name: api_location
inputs.description: Directory location of the Azure Functions source code

inputs.name: output_location
inputs.description: Directory location of the compiled application code after building

inputs.name: app_build_command
inputs.description: Custom command for Oryx to run when building application source code

inputs.name: repo_token
inputs.description: Token for interacting with the Github repository. Currently used only for commenting on Pull Requests.

inputs.name: routes_location
inputs.description: Directory location where the routes.json file can be found in the source code

inputs.name: skip_app_build
inputs.description: Skips the build step for the application source code if set to true.

inputs.name: config_file_location
inputs.description: Directory location where the staticwebapp.config.json file can be found in the source code

inputs.name: skip_api_build
inputs.description: Skips the build step for the Azure Functions source code if set to true.

inputs.name: production_branch
inputs.description: When specified, deployments from other branches will be considered preview environments.

inputs.name: deployment_environment
inputs.description: Name of the Azure Static Web Apps environment to deploy to.

inputs.name: is_static_export
inputs.description: Indicates you are using `next export` to generate a static site if set to true.

inputs.name: data_api_location
inputs.description: Directory location of the Data API configuration files

latest_release.name: GitHub Action for deploying to Azure Static Web Apps
